name: Nia: Jewel Hunter
description:
Have you got what it takes to solve the mysteries of Egypt?
Solve puzzles and gather gems in this interesting 3d platform puzzler.
Play the role of Nia: Jewel Hunter as she goes through different
pyramids and temples, trying to unlock the hidden exits!

Features:

Beautiful 3d levels
Cute Nia Character
Gorgeous Environments
Collect jewels and coins
Two control schemes, touch and button
Play over 18 large levels
2 Bonus levels
Unlock clever puzzles and secrets

Follow us for the latest info and game news!
